Playing this game for years now and I'm still shit at it. I have way to many friends who have steam yet don't have this game. Like WHY NOT!? It's now free and majority of the people using steam own the game. Even if the free version is full of hackers and cheaters you only have to pay a little of your parents money to play with the big boys. Or you could just learn to play with hackers and become and literal GOD when it comes to quick scoping, wall banging and getting the perfect flick and pin pointing the recoil patterns for every single weapon. If you use steam (which I know you do) and you don't own this game, own it, like, NOW!
